## BndResponsePatternTT

### BndResponsePatternTT Globally
```
Globally, it is always the case that if "R" holds for at least "c0" time units, then "Q" holds afterwards for at least "c1" time units
```
```
true;⌈R⌉ ∧ ℓ ≥ 50;⌈Q⌉ ∧ ℓ < 50;⌈!Q⌉;true
```
